com.pixolus.meterreading

Class Metadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pixolus.meterreading.Metadata

  • public class Metadata
extends Object
    The Metadata class is a collection of additional information around a captured meter reading.

    This class just provides a set of read-only values to implementations of MeterReadingViewListener, when onScanReadings() is called. It may be extended with additional attributes in the future, but no attributes are expected to go away.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Metadata.CaptureType
      Indicates the reason for a capture event (successful OCR, timeout, user-initiated manual capture).

    • Field Detail

      • recognizedMeterAppearance

        public final MeterAppearance recognizedMeterAppearance
        The meter appearance that was recognized. If no meter was recognized, this property returns MeterAppearance.INVALID. If a mode which recognizes multiple appearances was set using MeterReadingView.setMeterAppearance(MeterAppearance), this property provides the concrete appearance that was recognized by the meter reading view (or MeterAppearance.INVALID if no meter was recognized).

      • torchOn

        State of the camera flash.
